grid.title: Movimentação de Combustível
grid.expression: Select :data.ini as dtini, :data.fin as dtfin, pcp.codprod, pro.descrprod, (Select nvl(Sum(ie.qtdneg*ie.atualestoque) ,0) From tgfite ie, tgfcab ce Where ie.nunota = ce.nunota And ie.codprod = pcp.codprod and ce.statusnota = 'L' and ie.atualestoque <> 0 And ce.codemp = :codemp And ce.dtneg < :data.ini ) saldo_inicial, (Select nvl(Sum(ie.qtdneg*ie.atualestoque) ,0) From tgfite ie, tgfcab ce Where ie.nunota = ce.nunota And ie.codprod = pcp.codprod And ie.codemp = :codemp And ie.atualestoque = 1 and ce.statusnota = 'L' And ce.dtneg Between :data.ini And :data.fin ) entradas, (Select nvl(Sum(ie.qtdneg*ie.atualestoque) ,0) From tgfite ie, tgfcab ce Where ie.nunota = ce.nunota And ie.codprod = pcp.codprod And ce.codemp = :codemp And ie.atualestoque = -1 and ce.tipmov = 'Q' and ce.statusnota = 'L' And ce.dtneg Between :data.ini And :data.fin ) saidas , (Select nvl(Sum(ie.qtdneg*ie.atualestoque) ,0) From tgfite ie, tgfcab ce Where ie.nunota = ce.nunota And ie.codprod = pcp.codprod and ce.statusnota = 'L' And ce.codemp = :codemp And ce.dtneg <= :data.fin ) saldo_final From ad_tsfppcp pcp Join tgfpro pro On pcp.codprod = pro.codprod Group By pcp.codprod, pro.descrprod order by pcp.codprod

grid.title: Volume Vendido
grid.expression: Select tanque, bomba,codprod, descrprod, abertura, saidas, fechamento, afericao, afericao-fechamento As diferenca From (Select b.Nrotanque tanque, I.Controle bomba, I.Codprod, p.Descrprod, (Select Sum(i2.Qtdneg * i2.Atualestoque) From Tgfite i2 Join Tgfcab c2 On c2.Nunota = i2.Nunota And c2.Dtneg < :data.ini Where i2.Codprod = I.Codprod And i2.Codemp = I.Codemp And i2.Controle = I.Controle And i2.Atualestoque <> 0) abertura, Sum(I.Qtdneg) Saidas, (Select Sum(i3.Qtdneg * i3.Atualestoque) From Tgfite i3 Join Tgfcab c3 On c3.Nunota = i3.Nunota And c3.Dtneg < To_Date(:data.fin) + 1 Where i3.Codprod = I.Codprod And i3.Codemp = I.Codemp And i3.Controle = I.Controle And i3.Atualestoque <> 0) fechamento, Nvl((Select Nvl(a.Qtdlits,0) From Ad_tsfadc a Where a.Nrotanque = b.Nrotanque And Trunc(a.Dhafericao) <= :datafin),0) afericao From Tgfite I Join Tgfcab C On I.Nunota = C.Nunota And C.Statusnota = 'L' Join Ad_tsfppct T On T.Codtipoper = C.Codtipoper And Nvl(Perdasai, 'N') = 'N' Join Ad_tsfppce E On E.Nuppc = 1 And E.Codemp = C.Codemp Join Ad_tsfppcp cp On cp.Codprod = I.Codprod And cp.Nuppc = 1 Join Tgfpro p On I.Codprod = p.Codprod Join Tgfvei vei On C.Codveiculo = vei.Codveiculo Left Join Ad_tsfppcb b On To_Char(b.Nrobomba) = I.Controle Where C.Dtneg Between :data.ini And :data.fin And C.Tipmov In ('Q') And I.Atualestoque = -1 And Nvl(T.Perdasai, 'N') = 'N' Group By b.Nrotanque, I.Controle, I.Codprod, p.Descrprod, I.Codemp Order By 1)

grid.title: Auditoria - <font color="#FF0000">Está faltando integração com o VederRoot</font>
grid.expression: Select tanque, bomba,codprod, descrprod, fechamento, 0 as veederroot, (fechamento - 0) as diferenca From (Select b.Nrotanque tanque, I.Controle bomba, I.Codprod, p.Descrprod, (Select Sum(i3.Qtdneg * i3.Atualestoque) From Tgfite i3 Join Tgfcab c3 On c3.Nunota = i3.Nunota And c3.Dtneg < To_Date(:data.fin) + 1 Where i3.Codprod = I.Codprod And i3.Codemp = I.Codemp And i3.Controle = I.Controle And i3.Atualestoque <> 0) fechamento From Tgfite I Join Tgfcab C On I.Nunota = C.Nunota And C.Statusnota = 'L' Join Ad_tsfppct T On T.Codtipoper = C.Codtipoper And Nvl(Perdasai, 'N') = 'N' Join Ad_tsfppce E On E.Nuppc = 1 And E.Codemp = C.Codemp Join Ad_tsfppcp cp On cp.Codprod = I.Codprod And cp.Nuppc = 1 Join Tgfpro p On I.Codprod = p.Codprod Join Tgfvei vei On C.Codveiculo = vei.Codveiculo Left Join Ad_tsfppcb b On To_Char(b.Nrobomba) = I.Controle Where C.Dtneg Between :data.ini And :data.fin And C.Tipmov In ('Q') And I.Atualestoque = -1 And Nvl(T.Perdasai, 'N') = 'N' Group By b.Nrotanque, I.Controle, I.Codprod, p.Descrprod, I.Codemp Order By 1)

grid.title: Abastecimento por Categoria
grid.expression: Select Nvl(v.Categoria,'Não Informada') categoria, Sum(Qtdneg) QTDNEG, case when v.categoria is null then '#FF0000' end as FGCOLOR, Round(Ratio_To_Report(Sum(qtdneg)) Over () * 100,2) As partic From Tgfite I Join Tgfcab C On I.Nunota = C.Nunota And C.Statusnota = 'L' Join tgfvei v On v.codveiculo = c.Codveiculo Join Tgfpro p On I.Codprod = p.Codprod Join Ad_tsfppcp pcp On I.Codprod = pcp.Codprod And pcp.Nuppc = 1 Join Ad_tsfppct T On T.Codtipoper = C.Codtipoper And (Nvl(Perdaent, 'N') = 'N' And Nvl(Perdasai, 'N') = 'N') Where I.Codemp = :codemp And C.Dtneg Between :data.ini and :data.fin And I.Atualestoque = -1 And C.Tipmov = 'Q' Group By v.Categoria

grid.title: :Categoria :codemp :dtini
grid.expression: Select vei.Categoria, C.Codemp, C.Nunota, C.Dtneg, C.Codtipoper, Ad_get.Nometop(C.Codtipoper) top, C.Codparc, PAR.Nomeparc, c.codveiculo, vei.marcamodelo, RegExp_Replace(vei.PLACA, '([A-Z]{3})([0-9]{4})', '\1-\2') PLACA, I.Codprod, P.Descrprod, I.Qtdneg, I.Vlrunit, I.Vlrtot From Tgfite I Join Tgfcab C On I.Nunota = C.Nunota And C.Statusnota = 'L' Join Tgfpar PAR On C.Codparc = PAR.Codparc Join Ad_tsfppct T On T.Codtipoper = C.Codtipoper And Nvl(Perdasai, 'N') = 'N' Join Ad_tsfppce E On E.Nuppc = 1 And E.Codemp = C.Codemp Join Ad_tsfppcp cp On cp.Codprod = I.Codprod And cp.Nuppc = 1 Join Tgfpro P On I.Codprod = P.Codprod Join Tgfvei vei On C.Codveiculo = vei.Codveiculo Where C.Codemp = :codemp And C.Dtneg Between :data.ini And :data.fin And C.Tipmov In ('Q') And I.Atualestoque = -1 And Nvl(T.Perdasai, 'N') = 'N' And vei.Categoria = :Categoria Order By Dtneg
